overview: This is a HBM bandwidth check design. Design contains 8 compute units of a kernel which has access to all HBM banks (0:31). Host application allocate buffer into all HBM banks and run these 8 compute units concurrently and measure the overall bandwidth between Kernel and HBM Memory.

containers.name: krnl_vaddmul
